title: Groundbreaking Bitcoin Donation: South Korea’s First Crypto Gift to Korean Red Cross
body: BitcoinWorld Groundbreaking Bitcoin Donation: South Korea’s First Crypto Gift to Korean Red Cross A remarkable event recently unfolded in South Korea, marking a significant milestone for cryptocurrency adoption and philanthropy. For the first time, an individual has made a substantial Bitcoin donation to a major charitable organization, setting a powerful precedent for future digital asset contributions in the nation. Pioneering Digital Asset Donation in South Korea South Korea has witnessed a historic moment with its first major individual cryptocurrency gift. On August 13, the Korean Red Cross announced it received 1 Bitcoin (BTC) from investor Kim Geo-seok. This generous digital asset donation was valued at approximately $119,000 at the time, as reported by local outlet Hankook Ilbo. This particular gift stands out as the first personal crypto donation since the Financial Services Commission introduced new guidelines in June. These guidelines specifically permit nonprofit organizations to convert digital assets into cash for their operations. How Does South Korea Crypto Philanthropy Work Now? The recent regulatory changes have paved the way for legitimate South Korea crypto philanthropy. Under the government’s updated guidelines, the donated Bitcoin will not be held as a digital asset for long. Instead, it will be sold immediately. All proceeds from the sale of this BTC are earmarked for critical humanitarian efforts. Specifically, the funds will support flood recovery initiatives across the nation and provide essential medical aid to vulnerable communities. This swift conversion and direct application of funds underscore the practical utility of such donations. The Impact of Crypto Charity: A New Era? This landmark Bitcoin donation signals a potential new era for charitable giving. Cryptocurrencies offer unique advantages for philanthropy, including: Global Reach: Digital assets can be transferred across borders quickly and efficiently. Transparency: Blockchain technology can provide a transparent ledger of transactions, enhancing trust. Lower Fees: In some cases, crypto transactions can incur lower fees compared to traditional banking methods. The acceptance of this donation by the Korean Red Cross demonstrates a growing recognition of digital assets within established charitable sectors. It encourages other individuals and organizations to consider cryptocurrency as a viable means of supporting noble causes worldwide. Paving the Way for Future Digital Asset Donations While this is a positive step, the landscape for digital asset donation still evolves. Regulatory clarity, market volatility, and public understanding remain key factors. However, this pioneering move by investor Kim Geo-seok and the proactive stance of the Korean Red Cross are setting a strong example. This event could inspire more philanthropists in South Korea and beyond to leverage their crypto holdings for social good. It highlights the potential for blockchain technology to not only disrupt finance but also to revolutionize charitable giving, making it more accessible and efficient. In conclusion, the first individual Bitcoin donation to the Korean Red Cross is more than just a financial transaction; it is a symbolic moment. It signifies the maturation of the South Korea crypto ecosystem and opens doors for digital assets to play a crucial role in humanitarian aid and community support. This act of generosity truly paves the way for a future where crypto charity is a mainstream force for positive change. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. Who made the first Bitcoin donation to the Korean Red Cross? Investor Kim Geo-seok made the pioneering Bitcoin donation to the Korean Red Cross . 2. What was the approximate value of the donated Bitcoin? The 1 Bitcoin donated was valued at approximately $119,000 at the time of the announcement. 3. How will the Korean Red Cross use the donated Bitcoin? Following government guidelines, the Bitcoin will be immediately sold, and the proceeds will fund flood recovery efforts and provide medical aid to vulnerable communities. 4. Why is this digital asset donation significant for South Korea? This is the first personal cryptocurrency donation accepted by a major nonprofit in South Korea since new regulations allowed such conversions, marking a significant step for South Korea crypto philanthropy. 5. Are more crypto donations expected in South Korea? While specific numbers are uncertain, this landmark event sets a precedent and could encourage more individuals and organizations to consider digital asset donation as a viable form of charitable giving in South Korea. This groundbreaking Bitcoin donation truly marks a new chapter for philanthropy. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it on your social media channels to spread awareness about the evolving landscape of crypto charity and its potential to make a real-world impact! title: US Banking Groups Push to Close Stablecoin Yield ‘Loophole’
body: Several major US banking associations are urging Congress to tighten new stablecoin regulations, warning that a gap in the GENIUS Act could allow issuers to skirt restrictions on paying interest to holders. Key Takeaways: TUS banking groups want Congress to close a GENIUS Act loophole allowing stablecoin yield via affiliates. They warn yield-bearing stablecoins could trigger $6.6T in bank deposit outflows. Such outflows could raise interest rates, cut loan availability, and increase borrowing costs. In a letter sent Tuesday , the Bank Policy Institute (BPI) said the law’s current wording leaves room for stablecoin issuers to offer yield indirectly through affiliated exchanges or other partners. The BPI was joined by the American Bankers Association, Consumer Bankers Association, Independent Community Bankers of America, and the Financial Services Forum. GENIUS Act Bans Stablecoin Yield Payouts by Issuers, Leaves Affiliate Loophole The GENIUS Act, signed into law by President Donald Trump on July 18, bans issuers from directly paying interest or yield but does not explicitly prohibit related entities from doing so. The groups argue that such an arrangement could disrupt the U.S. financial system, citing a US Treasury estimate that yield-bearing stablecoins could trigger as much as $6.6 trillion in deposit outflows from traditional banks. Banks rely on deposits to fund loans, and a large-scale shift into stablecoins could, they warn, drive up borrowing costs for businesses and households. “Payment stablecoins should not pay interest the way highly regulated and supervised banks do on deposits or offer yield as money market funds do,” the letter stated, emphasizing that stablecoins do not engage in lending or securities investment to generate returns. Yield remains a key draw for stablecoin adoption. Some issuers, such as Tether (USDT), have historically avoided offering interest directly, while others benefit from exchange-based rewards. So-called stablecoins are effectively zero-yield money market funds, created primarily for regulatory arbitrage. Why else own one when T-bills yield 4%+? Are ounterparty, regulatory, and depegging risks underestimated in today’s environment? #GENIUSACT $USDT $USDC $CRCL pic.twitter.com/rE7VTJij2k — Parker Evans, CFA, CFP (@HParkerEvans) August 7, 2025 For example, users holding Circle’s USDC on Coinbase or Kraken can earn returns, creating a competitive alternative to traditional savings accounts. The banking groups warn that the rise of yield-bearing stablecoins could heighten “deposit flight risk,” particularly during economic stress, leading to tighter credit conditions. “The corresponding reduction in credit supply means higher interest rates, fewer loans, and increased costs for Main Street businesses and households,” they wrote. Tether and USDC Control Over 80% of $280B Stablecoin Market The stablecoin market is currently valued at $280.2 billion, with Tether and USDC commanding more than 80% of the sector at $165 billion and $66.4 billion, respectively, according to CoinGecko. While that figure is still small compared to the $22 trillion U.S. money supply, the Treasury projects the market could grow to $2 trillion by 2028. As reported, two of America’s largest crypto-linked companies, Coinbase and PayPal, are pushing forward with stablecoin yield programs , despite new US legislation explicitly banning such incentives for stablecoin issuers. In recent earnings calls, executives at both Coinbase and PayPal confirmed they will continue rewarding users who hold stablecoins on their platforms, arguing the law does not apply to them. “We are not the issuer,” Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong said , responding to a shareholder question. “We don’t pay interest or yield, we pay rewards.” The post US Banking Groups Push to Close Stablecoin Yield ‘Loophole’ appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Urgent Bitcoin Price Drop: What’s Next for BTC Below $119,000?
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent Bitcoin Price Drop: What’s Next for BTC Below $119,000? The cryptocurrency world is abuzz as Bitcoin (BTC) experiences an urgent price drop, falling significantly below the $119,000 mark. This sudden shift has captured the attention of investors and analysts across the entire cryptocurrency market. According to Bitcoin World market monitoring, BTC is currently trading around $118,964.36 on the Binance USDT market. This movement highlights the inherent volatility of digital assets and prompts a closer look at what drives such fluctuations. Understanding the Recent Bitcoin Price Drop The recent Bitcoin price drop below a key psychological level of $119,000 is a notable event for the digital asset space. While such downturns can feel unsettling, they are a regular feature of the volatile crypto landscape. Bitcoin, as the leading cryptocurrency, often sets the tone for the broader market. When BTC experiences a significant dip, other altcoins frequently follow suit, demonstrating the interconnectedness of the ecosystem. Market observers are closely watching the hourly charts and trading volumes to gauge the strength of this downward momentum. A break below such a significant support level can trigger further sell-offs, as traders adjust their positions based on technical indicators and market sentiment. What’s Driving This BTC Market Analysis? Several factors typically influence a BTC market analysis and can contribute to a sudden price decline. Understanding these elements helps investors make informed decisions. These can include: Macroeconomic Headwinds: Global economic indicators such as inflation rates, interest rate hikes by central banks, or geopolitical tensions can push investors away from riskier assets like cryptocurrencies. Regulatory Uncertainty: News or rumors of stricter regulations in major economies can create fear and lead to sell-offs. Investors often react quickly to potential government interventions. Whale Movements: Large holders, often called "whales," can significantly impact prices with massive buy or sell orders. A coordinated sell-off by a few whales can trigger a domino effect. Technical Breakdowns: When Bitcoin breaks below crucial support levels on price charts, it can signal to algorithmic trading systems and technical analysts that further declines are likely, prompting more selling pressure. These elements, individually or in combination, can exert considerable pressure on the Bitcoin value, leading to rapid price adjustments. Navigating Current Cryptocurrency Market Trends How should investors navigate the current cryptocurrency market trends when Bitcoin faces a significant correction? Volatility presents both challenges and opportunities. For many, a price dip can be a chance to "buy the dip," acquiring assets at a lower cost. However, it also carries risks, especially if the downturn continues. It is crucial to differentiate between short-term fluctuations and long-term potential. While the immediate Bitcoin price drop might seem alarming, Bitcoin has a history of recovering from even more substantial corrections. Maintaining a diversified portfolio and avoiding impulsive decisions are key strategies during such periods. Smart Crypto Trading Strategies Amid Volatility During periods of high volatility, adopting smart crypto trading strategies becomes paramount. Panic selling often leads to losses, while a disciplined approach can help mitigate risks and even capitalize on market movements. Consider these actionable insights: Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of investing a lump sum, commit to investing a fixed amount at regular intervals, regardless of the price. This strategy averages out your purchase price over time. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Set clear stop-loss orders to limit potential losses if the price continues to fall beyond your comfort level. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of market news, but avoid reacting to every minor fluctuation. Focus on fundamental developments and broader economic shifts. Rebalance Your Portfolio: Use market dips as an opportunity to re-evaluate your asset allocation. You might consider adjusting your holdings to maintain your desired risk profile. These strategies help build resilience in your investment approach, especially when the Bitcoin value is experiencing pressure. The Enduring Bitcoin Value Proposition Despite the recent Bitcoin price drop , many long-term investors remain confident in the enduring Bitcoin value proposition. Bitcoin’s foundational principles—decentralization, scarcity, and a fixed supply—continue to underpin its appeal. It remains a store of value for many, often referred to as "digital gold." Moreover, institutional adoption of Bitcoin continues to grow, with more companies and financial institutions exploring its integration into their portfolios and services. This increasing mainstream acceptance suggests a maturing market, even with its characteristic volatility. History shows that Bitcoin has always rebounded, often reaching new all-time highs after significant corrections, demonstrating its resilience in the face of market challenges. In conclusion, the urgent Bitcoin price drop below $119,000 serves as a stark reminder of the dynamic nature of the cryptocurrency market. While short-term fluctuations can be unsettling, a thorough BTC market analysis reveals underlying factors and offers opportunities for those prepared with solid crypto trading strategies . By staying informed, managing risk, and understanding the long-term Bitcoin value , investors can navigate these cryptocurrency market trends with greater confidence. The journey of digital assets is rarely a straight line, but for many, the potential rewards outweigh the inherent volatility. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. Why did Bitcoin fall below $119,000? Bitcoin’s price drop can be attributed to a combination of factors including macroeconomic headwinds like inflation and interest rate concerns, regulatory uncertainty, large sell-offs by "whales," and technical breakdowns on price charts. 2. Is this a good time to buy BTC? Whether it’s a good time to buy BTC depends on individual risk tolerance and investment strategy. While price dips can offer opportunities to acquire Bitcoin at a lower cost, further declines are possible. Many long-term investors use strategies like Dollar-Cost Averaging during such periods. 3. How does a Bitcoin price drop affect other cryptocurrencies? Bitcoin is the largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, and its price movements often influence the broader cryptocurrency market. A significant Bitcoin price drop typically leads to other altcoins also experiencing declines, reflecting the interconnected nature of the crypto ecosystem. 4. What are the best strategies during market downturns? Effective strategies during market downturns include Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA), setting stop-loss orders to manage risk, staying informed with reliable news, and avoiding emotional or impulsive trading decisions. Diversifying your portfolio also helps. 5. What is the long-term outlook for Bitcoin? Despite short-term volatility, the long-term outlook for Bitcoin remains positive for many investors. Its fixed supply, decentralization, and increasing institutional adoption continue to underpin its value proposition. Historically, Bitcoin has shown resilience, recovering from past corrections to reach new highs. Did this analysis help you understand the recent Bitcoin price drop? Share your thoughts and insights with your network! Connect with us on social media to stay updated on the latest cryptocurrency market trends and join the conversation. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin price drop trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action . This post Urgent Bitcoin Price Drop: What’s Next for BTC Below $119,000? first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Binance Announces Both Listing and Delisting! Here Are the Four Altcoins Affected!
body: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, started the day with an altcoin announcement. Binance announced both a delisting and listing today. Accordingly, announcements came for BFUSD, ANIME, HYPER and STO. Binance announced that three spot trading pairs, ANIME/FDUSD, HYPER/FDUSD, and STO/BNB, will be removed from the exchange, while BFUSD will be listed. They can enjoy zero fees (where applicable) on BFUSD/USDT spot and margin trading pairs.” Delist Announcement Also Arrived! title: Crypto Short Losses: Abraxas Capital Faces Staggering $244.78M Blow
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Short Losses: Abraxas Capital Faces Staggering $244.78M Blow The world of crypto can be incredibly volatile, offering immense opportunities but also significant risks. Recently, a major headline emerged, drawing attention to the substantial challenges faced by a prominent crypto investment firm . Abraxas Capital, a well-known name in the digital asset space, is currently grappling with considerable crypto short losses . Reports indicate the firm is facing an estimated $244.78 million in unrealized losses from various short positions. This situation highlights the inherent risks involved when betting against market trends in the fast-paced cryptocurrency environment. What Led to Abraxas Capital’s Significant Unrealized Losses? According to data shared by Onchain Lens on X, Abraxas Capital’s portfolio includes short positions across several major cryptocurrencies. These include Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Hyperliquid (HYPE), and Sui (SUI). The bulk of these unrealized crypto losses , over $188.7 million, reportedly stems from their Ethereum (ETH) short positions. Shorting involves borrowing an asset and selling it, hoping to buy it back at a lower price later to profit from the difference. However, if the asset’s price rises instead, the short seller faces losses. This is precisely what appears to have happened, leading to these substantial figures for Abraxas Capital . Understanding the Impact of Bitcoin Ethereum Shorts The significant portion of losses coming from Ethereum shorts is particularly notable. Ethereum, being the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, often influences broader market sentiment. When a crypto investment firm takes large short positions on such a foundational asset and the market moves unfavorably, the financial repercussions can be immense. This scenario involving significant Bitcoin Ethereum shorts illustrates the high stakes. While Bitcoin (BTC) also contributed to the losses, the sheer scale of the ETH-related impact underscores the challenge. This scenario serves as a powerful reminder that even sophisticated firms can encounter unexpected market movements. Therefore, careful risk management remains paramount in the volatile digital asset landscape. What Do These Crypto Short Losses Mean for the Market? Abraxas Capital’s situation offers a glimpse into the broader dynamics of the cryptocurrency market. It demonstrates that even when firms anticipate a downturn, market resilience or unexpected rallies can quickly turn speculative positions into significant liabilities. Consequently, other firms might re-evaluate their own short-selling strategies. This incident could also prompt discussions around transparency and risk exposure within the digital asset investment space. As the market matures, understanding the vulnerabilities faced by large players becomes crucial for overall market stability. Ultimately, this event highlights the unpredictable nature of crypto, even for seasoned participants dealing with potential unrealized crypto losses . Key Takeaways from Abraxas Capital’s Short Positions Significant Exposure: Abraxas Capital held substantial short positions across major cryptocurrencies. Ethereum’s Role: The majority of the $244.78 million in losses stemmed from ETH short positions. Market Volatility: The incident underscores the inherent unpredictability of crypto markets, even for experienced firms. Risk Management: It serves as a crucial reminder for all investors about the importance of robust risk management strategies when engaging in leveraged or speculative trades. The substantial crypto short losses reported by Abraxas Capital, a notable crypto investment firm , serve as a stark reminder of the inherent risks in cryptocurrency investing, particularly when engaging in complex strategies like shorting. This incident, largely driven by unfavorable movements in Ethereum and Bitcoin, underscores the volatility and rapid shifts that characterize the digital asset market. It emphasizes the critical importance of robust risk management and the unpredictable nature of even the most established cryptocurrencies. The challenges faced by Abraxas Capital with their Bitcoin Ethereum shorts provide valuable lessons for the wider crypto community. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is a short position in cryptocurrency? A short position in cryptocurrency involves borrowing a digital asset (like Bitcoin or Ethereum) and immediately selling it, with the expectation that its price will fall. The goal is to buy the asset back later at a lower price, return it to the lender, and profit from the price difference. 2. Which cryptocurrencies contributed most to Abraxas Capital’s losses? According to reports, the majority of Abraxas Capital’s unrealized losses, over $188.7 million, stemmed specifically from their short positions in Ethereum (ETH). Bitcoin (BTC), Solana (SOL), Hyperliquid (HYPE), and Sui (SUI) also contributed to the total. 3. What does “unrealized loss” mean? An unrealized loss is a loss that exists on paper but has not yet been finalized through a sale. In the context of shorting, it means the price of the asset has risen since the short position was opened, making the current value of the borrowed assets higher than the price they were sold for, but the position has not yet been closed. 4. How does this incident affect the broader crypto market? While one firm’s losses may not directly crash the entire market, incidents like this highlight the inherent volatility and risks of certain trading strategies. They can lead other investment firms to re-evaluate their risk management practices and potentially influence overall market sentiment regarding short-selling or leveraged positions in crypto. Did this article shed light on the challenges of crypto shorting? Share your thoughts and this valuable insight with your network on social media to keep the conversation going! title: Ethereum Flashes Once-In-A Decade Bull Signal, Says Analyst
body: Ethereum’s chart is lighting up with what crypto analyst Kevin of Kev Capital calls a “once-in-a-decade” confluence of bullish signals — patterns and indicators that he says have not appeared together in the asset’s history. In a video update on August 12, Kevin revisited his May forecast for “ETH season” and detailed why the rally is unfolding almost exactly as projected, while warning that the final technical barrier is still intact. Ethereum Faces On Last Hurdle Two months ago, when sentiment toward Ethereum was at its most pessimistic in years, Kevin issued an alert based on the ETH/USD, ETH dominance, and ETH/BTC monthly charts. “We were probably the first people flashing these warning signals on ETH… it was so blatant and so obvious… something historical,” he said. Since that call, ETH has gained more than 150%, with related “beta plays” such as Chainlink, Uniswap, and Ethereum Classic seeing triple-digit percentage gains from their lows. The catalyst, Kevin explained, began with a rare monthly demand candle at major support — a formation that in past cycles preceded massive rallies. That was backed by multiple momentum indicators turning from extreme oversold levels. Related Reading: Ethereum Price To Surge To $8,500? The Mechanics Of The Current Bull Run The monthly Stock RSI showed what he described as an unprecedented “V-shaped turnaround,” the MACD histogram had been coiling tighter since late 2019, and whale money flow was reversing from the lowest readings in Ethereum’s history. “You’re now just seeing the monthly MACD cross at the apex of this pattern… right at the zero line,” he noted, framing it as the technical ignition point for a sustained breakout. On ETH dominance, Kevin pointed to the same multi-indicator alignment: oversold RSI and Stock RSI, an imminent MACD cross, and price hitting the same support that underpinned the 2019–2020 cycle. In his view, that bottom signaled the start of a durable phase of ETH outperformance, one that would lead altcoins higher. The ETH/BTC chart, he argued, confirmed the timing: “The lead altcoin showed the way… the bottom is obviously in.” Still, Kevin stressed that Ethereum is not yet in open price discovery. The key resistance remains its previous all-time high at roughly $4,850. “We’re not in the clear… don’t be buying into four-year major historical resistance levels. That’s never smart. That will get you hurt,” he warned, noting that on the broader “Total 2” market cap chart for all altcoins excluding Bitcoin, the $1.71–$1.72 trillion zone is the last major “line in the sand.” Until those levels are broken on high time frames, he sees the market in a high-risk, high-reward posture. Related Reading: Ethereum Reclaims $4,600 With Unprecedented $1 Billion In Spot ETF Inflow Macro conditions may tip the scales. With CME FedWatch now pricing in a 90%+ probability of a US interest rate cut in September, and additional cuts projected for October and December, Kevin believes the mix of easing monetary policy and technical breakout structures creates a “perfect recipe” for altcoin outperformance. Even so, he cautioned that macro shocks could derail momentum and that traders should position with pullbacks in mind rather than chasing into resistance. For now, Kevin is content to acknowledge a rare technical alignment that he believes has already made history. “The ETH dominance call, the ETH versus Bitcoin call that we made a few months ago has played out beautifully… I think there will be pullbacks, but overall, we are on the back half of this bull market,” he said. Whether that back half erupts into price discovery hinges on one number: $4,850. Until then, Ethereum’s once-in-a-decade bull signal remains charged — but not yet fully unleashed. At press time, ETH traded at $4,624. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Shiba Inu To Explode 160% To $0.000035? Machine Learning Algorithm Predicts Timeline
body: The Shiba Inu price has seen a rollercoaster few months characterized by crashes after seeing a moderate rally. This time around, the meme coin’s price has begun to move upward once again, and this could sustain if the market continues to rise alongside Bitcoin. Keeping up with this trend, the machine learning algorithm at the CoinCodex website has predicted that the Shiba Inu price will continue to rally. What’s more, the price could be hitting a new yearly peak soon. Shiba Inu Rally To Push Price By 160% The predictions on the website have shown a rather bullish roadmap for the Shiba Inu price going forward. This ranges from the very short term to mid-ter,m with each one expected to see an increase in price from here. The first of these is the 5-day prediction that already suggests that the Shiba Inu price is on the right path . The machine learning algorithm puts the Shiba Inu price at $0.00001441 in 5 days, which is a 6.6% increase from the current price. Next on the list is the one-month prediction that would enter into the month of September from here. The machine learning algorithm suggests that the price would only be slightly up, with a 6.15% increase to $0.00001434. However, looking at the longer timeframe, moving into the month of September, the Shiba Inu price is expected to more than double from here. Most of this move is forecasted to happen in the month of September, triggering a rally to $0.00003549. Reaching this level would mean a 160% increase in price, with the algorithm predicting that this would happen toward the end of the month of September, with a September 22 date set as the peak. From here, though, the price is expected to reverse and decline after peaking at $0.00003549, and then dropping back to $0.00001955 by October 2025. SHIB’s September Movements Could Align Shiba Inu has seen varying performances in the month of September since its creation. So far, there have been a total of two months over the years closing in the green and two months closing in the red. This has brought its average return to +4.15%, according to the CryptoRank website . Given this, where the Shiba Inu price could be headed in the next month could very much be dependent on the general market sentiment. If the current bullish trend continues, then it could bleed into September, and if the machine learning algorithm is correct, then it would see the third quarter of the year completed in the green for SHIB.

title: LumiWave Mainnet: Exciting Q1 2026 Launch Set to Revolutionize IP Blockchain
body: BitcoinWorld LumiWave Mainnet: Exciting Q1 2026 Launch Set to Revolutionize IP Blockchain Get ready for a significant leap in the blockchain space! LumiWave, an innovative Sui-based IP blockchain project, has officially announced its much-anticipated LumiWave mainnet launch, slated for the first quarter of 2026. This news marks a pivotal moment for the decentralized intellectual property sector, promising a robust platform for creators and innovators globally. It’s an exciting development that could reshape how digital assets and creative works are managed. What is LumiWave and Its Ambitious LumiWave Roadmap? LumiWave is carving out a unique niche in the digital world by building a specialized IP blockchain project . Their core mission is to empower creators with decentralized tools for managing, protecting, and monetizing their intellectual property. The recently unveiled LumiWave roadmap outlines a clear, strategic path to achieving this ambitious future, focusing on steady progress and community involvement. For the remainder of 2024, the project has several key milestones planned, demonstrating a commitment to incremental yet impactful development: Q3 2024: Enabling DAO Voting. LumiWave will introduce decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) voting, giving the community a direct voice in governance. This move underscores their commitment to decentralization and collective decision-making. Simultaneously, they will begin publishing infrastructure advancement, laying the groundwork for future functionalities. Q4 2024: Alpha Rollout and Token Utility Expansion. Users can look forward to the rollout of the publishing layer alpha version. This early release will provide valuable insights and feedback opportunities. Furthermore, this period will focus on expanding the project’s token utility, making its native token more integral and valuable within the ecosystem. Why is the LumiWave Mainnet Launch a Game-Changer for Sui Blockchain? The planned LumiWave mainnet launch in Q1 2026 represents the culmination of these developmental phases. A mainnet, in blockchain terms, is the fully functional, public blockchain network where actual, real-world transactions occur, moving beyond test environments. For LumiWave, this means a live, decentralized platform ready to host and manage intellectual property rights at scale. It’s a huge step towards mainstream adoption. Operating on the high-performance Sui blockchain , LumiWave benefits significantly from Sui’s architecture, which is designed for high throughput and low latency. These characteristics are absolutely essential for handling the complex data and numerous transactions associated with intellectual property management. This robust foundation ensures that the platform can scale efficiently while providing a secure, fast, and reliable environment for creators and IP owners. The move to mainnet signifies not just readiness, but a commitment to delivering a powerful, real-world solution. How Does LumiWave Revolutionize the IP Blockchain Project Space? The vision behind LumiWave is to directly address long-standing challenges within traditional intellectual property management. These issues often include a lack of transparency, complex ownership verification processes, and limited global accessibility. By leveraging blockchain technology, LumiWave aims to create an immutable and transparent record of IP, providing undeniable proof of creation and ownership. This innovative approach fundamentally transforms how creators can protect, verify, and ultimately monetize their creative works. Moreover, the expansion of token utility, as detailed in the LumiWave roadmap for Q4 2024, is a critical component of its ecosystem. This means the native token will have an increasing number of functions within the platform. These functions could potentially cover aspects like transaction fees, access to premium features, or enhanced participation in the DAO voting process. This deep integration fosters a self-sustaining, vibrant, and engaged community, ensuring the long-term health and decentralization of the IP blockchain project . What’s Next for LumiWave and the Future of Decentralized IP? LumiWave’s commitment to a structured development timeline, culminating in the highly anticipated LumiWave mainnet launch, signals a strong dedication to its ambitious mission. As the project diligently progresses through its 2024 milestones—from establishing DAO governance to rolling out alpha releases and expanding token utility—the excitement builds for what promises to be a truly transformative platform. The decentralized IP space is evolving rapidly, and LumiWave is strategically positioning itself at the forefront, ready to empower creators globally. Keep a close eye on their journey as they prepare to reshape intellectual property rights on the blockchain, fostering a more equitable and transparent creative economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is LumiWave? A1: LumiWave is an innovative Sui-based IP blockchain project focused on creating a decentralized platform for managing, protecting, and monetizing intellectual property for creators. Q2: When is the LumiWave mainnet launching? A2: The LumiWave mainnet is officially scheduled to launch in the first quarter (Q1) of 2026. Q3: What does ‘DAO voting’ mean in the context of LumiWave? A3: DAO voting refers to decentralized autonomous organization voting, which allows the LumiWave community to participate directly in the project’s governance and decision-making processes. Q4: How does LumiWave leverage the Sui blockchain? A4: LumiWave operates on the Sui blockchain to benefit from its high throughput and low latency, which are crucial for efficiently handling complex IP data and transactions. Q5: What are the key milestones for LumiWave in 2024? A5: In Q3 2024, LumiWave plans to enable DAO voting and begin publishing infrastructure advancement. In Q4 2024, they will roll out the publishing layer alpha version and expand token utility. Did you find this article insightful? title: Ethereum Sees Biggest Search Spike on Google Since 2021 as ETH Nears ATH
body: Global search interest for “ Ethereum ” has soared to its highest level since 2021, according to Google Trends data , reflecting a surge in public attention as the cryptocurrency closes in on record prices. The surge coincides with heightened institutional activity, propelling Ether to $4,670 on Wednesday and bringing it within 5% of its Nov. 2021 record high. Google’s data shows sharp growth in search traffic over recent weeks, culminating in a steep rise that eclipses all peaks from the past three years. North Macedonia, Switzerland, Singapore, Slovenia and Austria led search interest, indicating a diverse spread of global curiosity. Source: Google Trends Institutional Demand Pushes ETH Higher as Treasuries Grow to $16.4B This rise in attention coincides with an 8% jump in Ether’s price in a single day, propelled by mounting demand from institutional investors and corporate treasuries . Figures from strategicethreserve.xyz show Ethereum-focused treasuries now hold $16.4b worth of ETH. At the same time, Ethereum’s network activity has reached an all-time record, with daily transactions hitting about 1.875m, according to CryptoQuant . Ethereum Approaching Price ATH While Transaction Count Hits Record High “Ethereum’s network activity has surged to unprecedented levels, with daily transactions reaching an all-time high of approximately 1.875 million.” – By @CryptoOnchain pic.twitter.com/IdZkVHAdTZ — CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) August 13, 2025 Jamie Elkaleh, chief marketing officer at Bitget Wallet, said more companies are integrating Ethereum into their treasuries as a strategic financial tool, not just a speculative bet. By staking ETH, firms can earn passive returns while supporting the network’s security, he said. However, co-founder Vitalik Buterin has cautioned that overleveraging these holdings could destabilize the ecosystem if forced liquidations occur. BlackRock, Fidelity Lead Record-Breaking ETH ETF Inflows Ryan Lee, chief analyst at Bitget, noted that spot Ethereum ETF inflows exceeded $1b on August 11, led by BlackRock’s ETHA and Fidelity’s FETH. He attributed the inflows to Ethereum’s growing role in DeFi and Web3, and to improved macro sentiment following softer US inflation data. Lee also pointed to the potential long-term impact of President Trump’s executive order allowing cryptocurrencies in 401(k) plans. Such policy changes, combined with ETF momentum and corporate accumulation, could expand crypto’s role in mainstream investment portfolios, he said. Piyush Walke, derivatives research analyst at Delta Exchange, noted Ethereum has significantly outperformed Bitcoin in recent weeks, gaining 25% in August versus Bitcoin’s 3% rise. Walke credited the rally to strong institutional inflows, technical breakouts and optimism surrounding Ether ETFs. Monday marked the highest ever daily net inflows for spot Ether ETFs at $1.01b, coinciding with a 90% price gain over the last 40 days, he noted. “Often seen as a bellwether for altcoins, Ethereum’s momentum could be an early signal of broader capital rotation into the wider altcoin market,” he added. BitMine and SharpLink Drive Bullish Momentum With Major ETH Purchases Institutions such as BitMine and SharpLink have sharply increased their ETH holdings, in some cases by several hundred percent. These purchases have reinforced bullish technical signals and driven prices through key resistance points. Analysts say its current momentum could foreshadow capital rotation into other digital assets. With search interest climbing and institutional engagement deepening, Ethereum’s approach to its all-time high is being watched closely by both retail traders and large investors. Many will be looking to see if the current wave of demand can sustain the rally and potentially push the cryptocurrency to new records. The post Ethereum Sees Biggest Search Spike on Google Since 2021 as ETH Nears ATH appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: OKB Token Burn: OKX’s Strategic Move Ignites Price Surge
body: BitcoinWorld OKB Token Burn: OKX’s Strategic Move Ignites Price Surge The crypto world is abuzz with significant news from a major player. Crypto exchange OKX recently announced a monumental OKB token burn , a strategic move that has immediately captured the market’s attention. This isn’t just a routine event; it’s a bold declaration about the future of the OKB token and its underlying OKX tokenomics . Investors and enthusiasts are watching closely to understand the full implications of this development. Understanding the OKB Token Burn Strategy OKX officially communicated its plan to conduct a one-time burn of a staggering 65.25 million OKB tokens. This massive incineration event will permanently alter the token’s availability. After this burn, the total supply of OKB will be fixed at precisely 21 million tokens. What does this mean? It signifies a dramatic reduction in the overall OKB circulating supply . Why is this important? Reducing supply can create scarcity, which often influences market dynamics. This action is a clear signal of OKX’s commitment to enhancing the value proposition of its native token. The Immediate Impact: OKB Price Surge The market’s reaction to the announcement was swift and emphatic. Data from CoinMarketCap quickly reflected a significant positive shift. OKB was observed trading at $86.58, marking an impressive 87.74% increase within a single day. This immediate OKB price surge highlights the market’s positive reception to OKX’s strategy. Such price movements are not uncommon following major token burn announcements. They reflect investor confidence in the long-term potential of a token when its supply is intentionally limited. It suggests that market participants believe this cryptocurrency supply reduction will lead to increased demand relative to available tokens. How Does OKX Tokenomics Benefit from This? Tokenomics refers to the economic model governing a cryptocurrency. The OKB token burn is a powerful tool within OKX’s tokenomics framework. By permanently reducing the total supply to 21 million, OKX aims to create a more deflationary asset. Key benefits for OKX’s tokenomics include: Enhanced Scarcity: A fixed, lower supply can make each remaining OKB token potentially more valuable over time. Increased Demand: As the token becomes scarcer, demand might increase, especially if the platform continues to grow and offer utility for OKB. Long-Term Value Proposition: This move signals a commitment to sustainable growth and value appreciation for OKB holders. It aligns OKB with a strategy often seen in successful cryptocurrencies aiming for long-term stability and growth. Why Cryptocurrency Supply Reduction Matters Token burns, a form of cryptocurrency supply reduction , are a common practice in the blockchain space. Projects undertake them for various reasons, primarily to manage token economics and potentially boost value. When a significant portion of tokens is removed from circulation, it directly impacts the supply-demand equation. Consider the broader implications: Deflationary Pressure: Burns can introduce deflationary pressure, counteracting inflationary tendencies. Investor Confidence: Such actions can signal a project’s health and commitment to its token’s value. Ecosystem Health: A well-managed supply can contribute to a healthier and more robust ecosystem around the token. The reduction in OKB circulating supply is a testament to OKX’s proactive approach to its token’s future. Looking Ahead: The Future of OKB The recent OKB token burn is a pivotal moment for OKX and its native asset. By drastically cutting the supply and fixing it at 21 million, OKX has positioned OKB for a new phase of development. The immediate OKB price surge demonstrates market confidence, but the long-term success will depend on continued utility, platform growth, and sustained demand for the now scarcer token. This strategic decision by OKX underscores the dynamic nature of cryptocurrency markets and the innovative ways exchanges are managing their digital assets to create lasting value for their communities. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the OKB token burn? The OKB token burn is a one-time event where OKX will permanently remove 65.25 million OKB tokens from circulation, fixing the total supply at 21 million. Why did OKX decide to burn OKB tokens? OKX decided to burn OKB tokens to reduce the total supply, create scarcity, and enhance the long-term value proposition of the token within its OKX tokenomics strategy. How does the token burn affect the OKB price? Reducing the OKB circulating supply typically creates scarcity, which can lead to increased demand and, consequently, a positive impact on the OKB price, as seen with the recent OKB price surge . What is the new total supply of OKB after the burn? After the 65.25 million OKB token burn, the total supply of OKB will be fixed at 21 million tokens. Is a cryptocurrency supply reduction common in the market? Yes, cryptocurrency supply reduction through token burns is a relatively common practice among projects aiming to manage their token’s economics, control inflation, and potentially increase value. Help us spread the word about the latest developments in the crypto space by sharing on your favorite social media platforms. title: HashFlare founders dodge extra prison time
body: HashFlare founders Sergei Potapenko and Ivan Turõgin avoided additional prison time after being given credit for time served in the $577M Ponzi scheme case. Seattle Federal Court Judge Robert Lasnik sentenced them to 16 months in prison, but they had already spent that time in custody following their 2022 indictment. However, Judge Lasnik ordered the defendants to pay a $25K fine each and complete 360 hours of community service under supervised release. The sentence also included the forfeiture of over $450M worth of real estate, cars, crypto, and crypto mining gear seized by the U.S. government and its foreign crime-busting partners. Details about the victim compensation remission process will be shared later, but the two will serve their supervised release back in Estonia. Potapenko and Turõgin had previously asked for time served, which was granted, but prosecutors feel a 10-year sentence would do better justice. The Department of Justice said on August 12 that it was also considering filing an appeal. Seattle prosecutors led by Assistant U.S. Attorneys Andrew Friedman and Sok Jiang said this was the largest crypto fraud they had ever tried. They used this argument in court to push for the 10-year jail term they sought. Miller says victims were hurt financially and emotionally Acting U.S. Attorney Teal Miller said “the vast majority” of victims in this case suffered losses that impacted them both financially and emotionally. The Ponzi scheme hurt unsuspecting customers who bought “a mirage of cryptocurrency mining” involving a non-existent “glitzy asset.” Miller felt it was wrong that the two used these millions of dollars to buy their own crypto, hire private jets, buy expensive jewelry, luxury cars, and real estate while their victims suffered. However, Judge Lasnik seemed to agree with Potapenko and Turõgin’s argument that the 440K customers did not suffer significant losses. The two also noted that about 390K of the customers who had bought nearly $487 million worth of HashFlare mining contracts had withdrawn roughly $2.3 billion. Turõgin’s attorney, Andery Spektor, claimed that no customer had suffered any harm, but acknowledged that HashFlare may have lied about the amount of crypto it mined. “These defendants were operating a classic Ponzi scheme … And just like a classic Ponzi, they diverted millions of dollars to their own benefit … Meanwhile, the vast majority of their victims suffered losses — in many cases, losses that had a serious impact on their financial and emotional well-being.” – Teal Miller , Acting U.S. Attorney The initial indictment asserted that the two had swindled HashFlare customers using false information about its mining capacity. The company allegedly mined less than 1% of what it claimed but stole more than $550 million from customers between 2015 and 2019. HashFlare also raised around $25 million from investors in 2017 under the guise of opening the Polybus digital bank. Bini claims ‘zero financial harm’ to anyone Defense counsel and partner at Reed Smith, Mark Bini, claimed that Potapenko and Turõgin were committed to ensuring “zero financial harm” to anyone. According to Bini, HashFlare returned over $350 million in crypto payments to victims between 2022 and 2025. However, prosecutors argued that the harm suffered by HashFlare victims could not be more real. The prosecutors also argued that the defendants had admitted that the data they had provided to discredit their victims’ claims was fabricated. They added that the expert opinion presented as evidence for the defense was substantially based on HashFlare investor earnings, not victim losses. The defendants repeatedly claimed in previous court filings that HashFlare customers did not suffer significant losses since $400 million worth of crypto had already been paid back to them. However, the prosecutors argued that this assumption was wrong. The forfeited assets will be available to compensate the victims at a later date, which has not yet been confirmed. title: Circle Shares Slide 5% Post-Market on Share Sale Plan Following 425% IPO Rally
body: Circle to sell 10M Class A shares, including 8M from existing shareholders, after massive IPO rally. Q2 revenue surged 53% to $658M, beating analyst estimates, despite IPO-related losses. USDC circulation rose 90% YoY to $65.2B, making it the fastest-growing major stablecoin. Circle Internet Financial shares dropped more than 5% in after-hours trading Tuesday after the company announced plans to sell 10 million Class A shares, following a staggering rally of over 425% since its June 5 IPO. In a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the stablecoin issuer said it will offer 2 million shares itself, while existing shareholders will sell 8 million shares. Underwriters will also have a 30-day option to purchase an additional 1.5 million shares. Circle down 6% after hours post announcing a 10m share offering (2m shares being sold by the company and 8m from existing holders including management). Here's the list of everyone selling: pic.twitter.com/QNCDoHLOTy — Omar (@TheOneandOmsy) August 12, 2025 Circle’s First Quarterly Earnings The announcement came just hours after Circle reported its first quarterly earnings as a publicly t… The post Circle Shares Slide 5% Post-Market on Share Sale Plan Following 425% IPO Rally appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Solana TVL Soars: Reaching an Astonishing $11.06 Billion High
body: BitcoinWorld Solana TVL Soars: Reaching an Astonishing $11.06 Billion High The Solana ecosystem is buzzing with excitement! Recent data reveals a monumental achievement: Solana TVL (Total Value Locked) has surged to an astounding $11.06 billion as of August 13th. This marks its highest point in over three years, a significant milestone according to DeFiLlama data. This remarkable growth signals increasing confidence and activity within the Solana blockchain , solidifying its position as a major player in the decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape. What’s Driving Solana TVL’s Remarkable Surge? Many factors contribute to this impressive increase in Solana TVL . The Solana network has seen a significant influx of new users and capital, attracted by its high throughput and low transaction fees. Unlike some other blockchains, Solana offers a scalable environment for dApps (decentralized applications). Ecosystem Expansion: Solana’s ecosystem continues to expand rapidly, with new decentralized applications, protocols, and services launching regularly. These include lending platforms, decentralized exchanges (DEXs), and NFT marketplaces. Developer Activity: A thriving developer community consistently builds and innovates on the Solana blockchain, introducing novel solutions and attracting more users. Institutional Interest: Growing institutional interest and investment in Solana-based projects also play a crucial role, bringing substantial capital into the ecosystem. Broader Market Recovery: The overall recovery and positive sentiment in the broader cryptocurrency market have also provided a tailwind, encouraging more investment across various digital assets. Solana Blockchain: A Closer Look at its DeFi Growth The rise in Solana’s TVL directly reflects its substantial DeFi growth . Total Value Locked represents the total amount of crypto assets deposited in decentralized finance protocols. A higher TVL indicates more capital locked within the ecosystem, suggesting greater utility and trust in its applications. Solana’s unique architecture, including its Proof-of-History (PoH) consensus mechanism, enables lightning-fast transactions and impressive scalability. However, like any rapidly evolving technology, challenges exist. Network stability has been a past concern, though significant improvements have been made. Despite these hurdles, Solana’s commitment to innovation and scalability continues to attract developers and users seeking efficient and cost-effective DeFi solutions. What Does This Mean for the Decentralized Finance Landscape? Solana’s ascent to over $11 billion in TVL is not just a win for its community; it has broader implications for the entire decentralized finance sector. It demonstrates the increasing maturity and adoption of alternative layer-1 blockchains beyond Ethereum. This surge highlights a growing diversification of capital across different ecosystems, fostering healthy competition and innovation. For investors and users, Solana’s strong TVL indicates a robust and active ecosystem. It suggests a growing pool of liquidity, which can lead to better trading conditions and more stable decentralized applications. As Solana continues its trajectory, it will undoubtedly influence future developments in the cryptocurrency market. In conclusion, Solana’s impressive surge in TVL to over $11 billion is a testament to its vibrant ecosystem, strong developer community, and the growing confidence in its technological capabilities. This milestone underscores its critical role in the evolving decentralized finance landscape, signaling a promising future for the Solana blockchain and its continued impact on the broader cryptocurrency market . Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Solana TVL? Solana TVL (Total Value Locked) refers to the total amount of cryptocurrency assets currently staked or locked within decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols operating on the Solana blockchain. It serves as a key metric for measuring the overall health and growth of a blockchain’s DeFi ecosystem. Why is Solana’s TVL increasing? Several factors contribute to Solana’s increasing TVL, including the rapid expansion of its DeFi ecosystem with new dApps, increased developer activity, growing institutional interest, and the overall positive sentiment in the broader cryptocurrency market. How does Solana compare to other blockchains in DeFi? Solana distinguishes itself with its high transaction speeds and low fees, making it an attractive alternative for DeFi activities. While Ethereum remains the largest DeFi ecosystem, Solana offers a scalable and efficient environment that appeals to users and developers seeking high-performance decentralized finance solutions. Is Solana TVL growth sustainable? The sustainability of Solana TVL growth depends on various factors, including continued innovation within its ecosystem, sustained developer and user adoption, and the overall trends in the cryptocurrency market. Its current trajectory suggests strong momentum, but like all crypto assets, it is subject to market volatility. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread the word about Solana’s remarkable growth! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping decentralized finance institutional adoption. This post Solana TVL Soars: Reaching an Astonishing $11.06 Billion High first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: OKB Token Burn Triggers Explosive 160% Price Surge
body: BitcoinWorld OKB Token Burn Triggers Explosive 160% Price Surge The cryptocurrency world recently witnessed a remarkable event: OKX’s native token, OKB , experienced an astonishing price surge, skyrocketing over 160% in a short period. This dramatic upward movement followed a significant announcement from the OKX exchange regarding a massive OKB token burn . This strategic move, which saw 65.25 million OKB tokens permanently removed from circulation, sent ripples through the market, capturing the attention of investors and enthusiasts alike. According to data from CoinMarketCap, the OKB crypto token quickly reached a trading price of $120.30, marking a phenomenal 161.02% increase within just 24 hours. Such rapid appreciation highlights the powerful effect that supply-side economics can have on digital assets, particularly within the dynamic realm of decentralized finance. What is an OKB Token Burn and Why Does It Matter? A token burn is a process where a specific amount of cryptocurrency tokens are intentionally and permanently removed from circulation. Think of it like a company buying back its own shares to reduce the total number available. For OKB, this means those 65.25 million tokens are gone forever, making the remaining tokens scarcer. Why do exchanges or projects perform a cryptocurrency token burn ? The primary goal is often to create deflationary pressure. By reducing the total supply, each remaining token theoretically becomes more valuable, assuming demand stays constant or increases. This can be a strong signal of commitment from the project, indicating a focus on long-term value for its holders rather than simply increasing the supply. Scarcity: Reduced supply can lead to increased demand and value. Value Proposition: Signals a commitment to token appreciation. Deflationary Mechanism: Counters potential inflation from new token issuance. The Mechanics Behind OKB’s Incredible OKB Price Surge The immediate and significant OKB price surge following the announcement wasn’t a coincidence. It’s a direct result of market dynamics reacting to the sudden reduction in supply. When a large quantity of tokens is burned, it immediately impacts the supply-demand balance. With fewer tokens available on exchanges and in wallets, the price per token tends to rise, especially if there’s sustained buying interest. This particular OKB token burn was substantial, representing a significant portion of the circulating supply. Such a large-scale event naturally triggers strong investor confidence, as it demonstrates a clear effort by OKX to enhance the value of its native asset. Traders and investors often view these events as bullish indicators, leading to increased buying pressure and, consequently, higher prices. The swiftness of the 160% increase within an hour underscores the market’s rapid response to such impactful news. This highlights how crucial official announcements from major exchanges like OKX can be in shaping immediate price action for their associated tokens. Understanding the Broader Impact of Cryptocurrency Token Burn While the OKB event is a prime example, token burns are not unique to OKX. Many blockchain projects and exchanges utilize this mechanism to manage their tokenomics. The concept is rooted in traditional finance principles of share buybacks, adapted for the digital asset space. However, it’s important to remember that while a token burn can provide a significant short-term boost, long-term sustainability depends on several factors beyond just supply reduction. These include the utility of the OKX token , the overall health of the OKX ecosystem, user adoption, trading volume, and broader market sentiment. A successful token burn should ideally complement a robust project roadmap and active development. Investors should always consider the underlying fundamentals of a project, not just isolated events like token burns, before making investment decisions. Due diligence remains paramount in the volatile crypto market. What Does This Mean for Existing OKX Token Holders? For those already holding OKB, the recent surge represents a substantial increase in their portfolio value. This event reinforces the potential benefits of holding exchange tokens, which often derive value from the success and operations of their parent exchange. The OKB crypto token specifically benefits from its integral role within the OKX ecosystem, including trading fee discounts, access to exclusive features, and participation in new token sales. Moving forward, the success of OKB will continue to be tied to OKX’s growth and innovation. The exchange’s commitment to regularly burning tokens, as indicated by this recent event, suggests a proactive approach to maintaining token value. This strategy aims to reward loyal holders and attract new investors by signaling a long-term vision for the token’s economic model. As the crypto landscape evolves, such deflationary mechanisms may become increasingly vital for tokens seeking to maintain or grow their value in a competitive market. The dramatic OKB token burn and subsequent OKB price surge serve as a powerful reminder of how targeted supply management can profoundly impact cryptocurrency valuations. OKX’s decisive action to burn 65.25 million OKB tokens not only led to an immediate market reaction but also reinforced the token’s position as a valuable asset within its ecosystem. This event underscores the importance of understanding tokenomics and the strategic decisions exchanges make to foster growth and stability for their native tokens. While impressive, remember that market dynamics are complex, and continuous research is key to navigating the crypto world effectively. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is an OKB token burn? An OKB token burn is a process where a specific quantity of OKB tokens are permanently removed from circulation, reducing the total supply of the token. This is done by sending them to an unrecoverable wallet address. 2. Why did OKB’s price surge after the burn? The price surged because the massive reduction in supply, coupled with sustained demand, created scarcity. This often leads to increased value per token, as fewer tokens are available in the market. 3. Are token burns common in cryptocurrency? Yes, token burns are a relatively common mechanism used by many cryptocurrency projects and exchanges to manage their tokenomics, control inflation, and potentially increase the value of their tokens. 4. What are the benefits of holding OKB? Holding OKB can offer benefits such as trading fee discounts on the OKX exchange, access to exclusive features, participation in OKX Jumpstart (new token sales), and potential value appreciation due to mechanisms like token burns. 5. Is OKB a good investment after the burn? While the token burn led to a significant price increase, investment decisions should always be based on thorough research of OKB’s long-term utility, the OKX ecosystem’s growth, overall market conditions, and your personal risk tolerance. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Did you find this analysis of the OKB token burn and its impact insightful? Share this article with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread awareness about significant market events and tokenomics strategies! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping altcoin price action. This post OKB Token Burn Triggers Explosive 160% Price Surge first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

Note that these predictions are not investment advice. Seek independent professional consultation or do your research. VeChain historic price sentiment VeChain Price History VeChain began in 2015 as a private consortium chain for blockchain applications. It transitioned to a public blockchain with the ERC-20 token VEN in 2017 and launched its mainnet as VET in 2018. In 2018, VeChain partnered with DHL to develop blockchain solutions for logistics but saw a significant price correction, stabilizing at lower levels. The price remained relatively stable in 2019 and 2020, with occasional spikes as VeChain continued developing technology and forming partnerships. In 2021, VeChain’s price surged to an all-time high of $0.20 in May but dropped to $0.070 by December. In 2022, VeChain attempted to recover but remained below $0.10, with continued volatility throughout the year and into early 2023. Towards the end of 2023, the price saw a slight uptick, stabilizing around $0.020 by early 2024. In 2024, VeChain’s price fluctuated, recovering to $0.025 by mid-March but dropping due to bearish trends, reaching a low of $0.019 by August. It traded around $0.021 in September but ended the month above the $0.024 mark. The price remained mostly stable in October, with the occasional bearish movement causing a decline from the $0.02400 level to start November at the $0.02100 price level. The asset closed November at a high level, with prices near the $0.04600 mark and a strong bullish outlook. However, the bulls only took the price higher in December, as the $0.0500 resistance was crushed swiftly. As of January 2025, VET traded around the $0.04300 mark as it started and closed the month around the same level. In February, the price fell towards the $0.03000 mark as bears took over, ending the month at $0.02800. In March, the net movement was low, but the volatility was very high, as the price fell to $0.02200 where it closed the month. In April the price saw an initial crash but observed sharp recovery ending the month above the $0.02600 mark. In May the price dwindled again ending the month around $0.0250. In June the price continued to struggle as it dropped to $0.0200 to end the month. July saw a sharp rise to the asset’s volatility with VET crossing the $0.02800 mark. However, the price could not be maintained and VET ended the month around the $0.02200 level.

title: Nasdaq-Listed Giant Announces $1.5 Billion Investment Plan for Trump-Backed Altcoin!
body: ALT5 Sigma Corporation, backed by US President Donald Trump’s sons Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., announced the completion of $1.5 billion in financing to launch a treasury strategy focused on WLFI, the native token of World Liberty Financial. Nasdaq-listed ALT5 Sigma aims to purchase approximately 7.5% of the total supply of the WLFI token and adopt a WLFI Treasury Strategy. WLFI CEO Zach Witkoff appointed as ALT5 President, Eric Trump joins as Director, and Kraken will serve as asset manager The company plans to allocate the raised funds to debt repayments, litigation resolution, and general corporate expenses, in addition to planned WLFI token purchases. World Liberty Financial co-founder and CEO Zach Witkoff will become chairman of ALT5 Sigma's board, while Eric Trump will join the company as an executive. Matt Morgan, ALT5’s chief investment officer, added that the company will swap half of the newly issued shares directly for WLFI, held by World Liberty Financial, setting the token’s value at $0.20. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Nasdaq-Listed Giant Announces $1.5 Billion Investment Plan for Trump-Backed Altcoin!

title: Omni Network Unveils Major Rebranding: What It Means for OMNI Token Holders
body: BitcoinWorld Omni Network Unveils Major Rebranding: What It Means for OMNI Token Holders The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with a fresh announcement from Omni Network (OMNI). This prominent Layer-1 blockchain project recently revealed on its official news channel that it will undergo a comprehensive blockchain rebranding . This move marks a significant crypto project update , promising to reshape its identity and potentially its trajectory. What’s Behind the Omni Network Rebranding? Omni Network is not just changing a few minor details. The announcement specifies a complete overhaul. As part of this strategic decision, the project will: Change its official project name. Introduce a brand-new logo. Migrate its existing OMNI token to a new contract or chain. This comprehensive approach suggests a deep-seated vision for the future, aiming to refresh its image and align with evolving goals. Such a significant shift in identity is rare for established Layer-1 blockchain projects. Why This Major Transformation for a Layer-1 Blockchain? Projects often undergo rebranding for various compelling reasons. For a Layer-1 blockchain like Omni Network , a rebrand might signify a broader strategic pivot or an evolution of its core mission. It could be about: Expanding Vision: Aligning the brand with new technological advancements or a wider market scope. Staying Ahead with Omni Network’s Evolution As Omni Network embarks on this exciting journey, staying informed is key. The team emphasizes transparent communication throughout the process. This proactive approach ensures you receive timely updates regarding the new name, logo, and the crucial OMNI token migration details. The rebranding of Omni Network is more than just a cosmetic change; it represents a strategic evolution for a promising Layer-1 blockchain . This significant crypto project update aims to strengthen its foundation and enhance its position in the competitive decentralized landscape. title: Finance Expert Says $1,000 XRP Price Won’t Be the Ceiling, But the Floor. Here’s why
body: Versan Aljarrah, co-founder of Black Swan Capitalist, has reiterated his highly bullish stance on XRP’s long-term value, arguing that a $1,000 price point would represent a baseline rather than an upper limit. His projection is tied to a vision in which XRP becomes the primary bridge asset for the global financial system. At the time of his comments, XRP is trading slightly above $3. $1,000 as the Baseline for a Global Bridge Asset According to Aljarrah, the price of XRP would have to increase substantially from its current level to serve its intended function in a future, fully integrated financial infrastructure. He believes that when XRP is adopted as the settlement layer for cross-border transactions and institutional flows, a $1,000 valuation would be the “floor,” not the “ceiling.” This, he says, would reflect the asset’s role in enabling global liquidity rather than speculative trading. Aljarrah connects this to the evolution of finance toward tokenized assets, real-time foreign exchange settlements, and sovereign debt swaps. When $XRP becomes the bridge for tokenized assets, real-time FX, and sovereign debt swaps, $1,000 won’t be the ceiling, it'll be the floor. A fixed max supply combined with transaction burns means supply shrinks as demand grows. That’s simple economics driving $XRP much higher. pic.twitter.com/b9oQEyorLw — Versan | Black Swan Capitalist (@VersanAljarrah) August 4, 2025 In such an environment, trillions of dollars could move efficiently across jurisdictions, with XRP facilitating these transfers as the bridge currency. He maintains that the current price range would not be sustainable for such a role, as the liquidity available would be insufficient to handle the scale of activity. Liquidity Requirements in a Tokenized Economy Aljarrah has previously argued that an XRP price of only a few dollars would be incompatible with a tokenized financial market worth trillions. In his view, much higher valuations—possibly in the hundreds or thousands of dollars—would be required to provide the necessary liquidity for large-scale settlements, central bank operations, and institutional transactions. This is because higher prices enable more value to be transferred with fewer tokens, increasing efficiency. The argument also takes into account XRP’s fixed supply of 100 billion tokens and the transaction burn mechanism that permanently removes a small amount from circulation with each transfer. Over time, this reduction in supply, combined with increasing demand, could place upward pressure on price. Aljarrah has stated that burning XRP is “unnecessary” given his expectation that demand will eventually outpace supply. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Views from Other Analysts This perspective aligns with claims from other XRP advocates. Crypto founder Jake Claver has said XRP is “programmed” to reach $10,000 for institutional efficiency. He has cited Ripple CTO David Schwartz, who explained that moving $1 billion at $1 per XRP requires 1 billion tokens, whereas a single token could achieve the same transfer if worth $1 billion. Claver has suggested that $10,000 XRP could provide over $500 trillion in theoretical liquidity, sufficient for trillion-dollar transfers, and has projected that such prices could be reached within two years. Skepticism and Timeline Considerations Despite the confidence of supporters like Aljarrah and Claver, their projections face skepticism. Critics note that such valuations would result in market capitalizations far exceeding total global wealth, which may not be realistic under current economic models. Nonetheless, some analysts believe that a $1,000 XRP price could be possible within the next decade if adoption, liquidity, and utility grow at the anticipated pace. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on X , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Finance Expert Says $1,000 XRP Price Won’t Be the Ceiling, But the Floor. Here’s why appeared first on Times Tabloid .
